This Cookie Policy explains how cookies and similar technologies are used on the website of the hpl company, herein referred to as ‘the Website,’ and by using the Website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy. Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to the owners of the site. Cookies are commonly used to store user preferences, track website usage, and enable features. The Website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience, provide personalized content, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. We utilize Google Tag Manager, a service provided by Google LLC, and Segment, a service provided by Twilio, to manage the tags used for tracking and analytics purposes.

These cookies are necessary for the functioning of the Website and cannot be switched off without impairing the basic functionality of the site. These cookies do not gather any information about you that could be used for marketing or remembering your browsing history.

We use performance and analytics cookies to collect information about how visitors use the Website. This helps us improve the performance of our site and understand which pages are most and least popular. The data collected is aggregated and anonymous, and it does not contain any personally identifiable information.

Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The information collected is used to display advertisements that are relevant and engaging for the individual user. However, we do not use these cookies to collect personally identifiable information.

In addition to the cookies we set, third parties may also set cookies when you visit the Website. These third-party cookies enable features such as social media sharing and provide analytics services. We do not have control over these cookies, and they are subject to the respective third party's privacy policies.

You can control and manage cookies in various ways, including by adjusting your browser settings. Most web browsers allow you to delete or block cookies, although doing so may affect your browsing experience. For more information on how to manage cookies, you can refer to your browser's help documentation.

We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any updates. If you have any questions about this Cookie Policy or our use of cookies, please contact us at privacy@hplcompany.com. This Cookie Policy was last updated on February 7th, 2024

text.text: These Terms of Use govern your use of our website. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website.

You agree to use our website for lawful purposes only and in a manner that does not violate any applicable laws or regulations. You further agree not to engage in any activity that may interfere with the operation or security of our website. If you opt in to tracking, you agree to be bound by the terms of the Cookie and Privacy policies.

All content, logos, trademarks, and other materials displayed on our website are the property of the hpl company or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, distribute, or modify any of the content on our website without prior written consent from us.

Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services for your convenience. We do not endorse or control these third-party sites and are not responsible for their content or practices. Your use of third-party sites is subject to their terms and policies.

Our website is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis, without any warranties of any kind, express or implied. We do not warrant that our website will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of viruses or other harmful components.

In no event shall the hpl company be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our website, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms of Use at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of our website after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated terms. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically for any updates.
These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Denver, Colorado, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, contact us at privacy@hplcompany.com.

Our team is a premier media buying agency specialized in maximizing the impact of advertising through the strategic utilization of data. Our team of experts excel in creating targeted campaigns across various digital platforms, including Meta, TikTok, LinkedIn, and Google.
We provide custom reporting and develop software based solutions to help our clients communicate, at scale, with the people who matter to their business.
We'll work with your team to figure out what's working, and how to do more of it.
We'll help you buy and sell ads across the internet.
We'll help your team measure what works.
We'll help supplement your team to help reach your goals.
at the hpl company, we're working to change the way people & brands communicate.

at the hpl company, we believe that who we are influences every aspect of our work. from the experiences we've had to the memories we've made, the setbacks we've experienced, the things we hold on to are part of our work, because they are a part of who we are, and who we are striving to be.

We help our clients as they encounter unfamiliar, urgent, and often intimidating challenges. We work on new problems. We rely on our values to help us know how to act in an environment that is changing faster than we can keep up with. They guide our decision making, but beyond that, they help us deliver work that drives impact.
We show up. We don't leave anything on the table. We're passionate about what we do, and if there's a job to be done, we roll up our sleeves and get to work.

Our clients trust us with some of their data, resources, and vision. We strive to be responsible stewards of this trust, and treat their business objectives as our own. Beyond that, we have a commitment to the amplify, reverence, and nurture the cultures, audiences, and data we rely on to do our work.

Thanks to our work, our world gets a little more connected every day. We ask questions, and are always looking for new solutions to old problems. We share the joy of communication with our clients and we try to find the wonder in our work.
We work on projects that we believe in, with partners who share our values. We show up with our whole selves, and strive to act with integrity.
We are responsible for what we say & do.

Our clients trust us to help them connect with the people who matter the most--their customers. We endeavour to operate with sincerity. We promote products & work with teams who share our values. We strive to be good stewards of our client's resources and reputations. We seek to get involved & connect with the communities & audiences we interact with. We focus on finding new answers & new solutions to old problems. We strive to operate with the highest standards of compliance and ethics. We adhere strictly to privacy regulations and industry guidelines, ensuring the responsible use of data in all our advertising endeavors.
We Design Together with Our Clients
Docendi deleniti eos ad. His enim tractatos ea, evertitur dissentiunt nec ut.
